---
name: Maintenance Report
description: Report a maintenance task or improvement
title: "Maintenance: "
labels: ["maintenance"]
assignees: []
---

## Maintenance Description
Describe the maintenance task, cleanup, refactoring, or improvement needed.

## Scope
What parts of the project are affected?

## Current State
Describe the current situation that needs maintenance.

## Proposed Changes
What changes are you proposing?

## Benefits
What benefits will this maintenance bring? (e.g., better performance, cleaner code, easier maintenance)

## Effort Estimate
Rough estimate of effort required (e.g., small, medium, large)

## Additional Notes
Any other relevant information.
